name: My Friendly Neighborhood
description: Something is amiss with everyone's favorite Saturday morning puppet show! For years, the colorful cast of The Friendly Neighborhood delighted audiences across the globe with their cooky capers and educational adventures. However, as time went on and interest waned, the production studio found themselves out of money and closed their doors for good. Toy sales would dwindle, and birthday balloons and cakes would find new mascots. In time, the once household names would fade into increasingly niche fandoms. Until one night years later, the studio unexpectedly clicks back to life and starts broadcasting The Friendly Neighborhood. TV sets across the globe flicker for a moment before the familiar puppets return for a surprise encore! But this isn't your typical family-friendly holiday special... are those puppets eating each other!?

name: Turbo Overkill
description: Johnny Turbo needs to clean up Paradise, a cyber city overrun by augmented minions under the cult control of the world's most advanced AI, Syn, who's looking to expand to world domination if not stopped here and now. Wall-running, Hero-Time, chain saw leg augments, flying cars and lots of booms. Fight to purge Syn with five new augments, dual chainsaw arms and a second chainsaw leg in the final episode, part 1.

name: Blast Droids
description: Sin descripción

name: Halloween is Crazy as Hell
description: Halloween is Crazy as Hell is a roguelike and bullet hell game, where you can have weapons that are completely different from each other with different special abilities, as well as items and little friends that will help you on your journey.

name: Cold Scream
description: Survival Horror Text Adventure

name: Across
description: Explore a world filled with mystery, ruins and unknown creatures as you reveal the memories of the Cub’s owner Estelle and her parents as they make their way to the city while a war approaches the kingdom.

name: Paranoid
description: You are not safe anymore, the past is here.

name: Kaboom!
description: Kaboom! is a game about blowing up your friends in an online battle arena for 2-8 players with free-for-all and team-based game modes.

name: Ace of Space
description: You and your spaceship versus thousands of aliens! Blast through waves of aliens with upgradable spaceships in this sci-fi shoot ’em up game and become the Ace of Space!

name: Hive
description: Take on the role of a man forced to take down the Hive-mind that has taken over the world - one monster at a time.

name: Travellers
description: Ancient-astronaut survival action game.

name: Web Dimension
description:
This game, according to the manual is Darwin's Theory of Evolution turned into a fabulous musical fantasy. There are eight levels of evolution, each having three phases:

Phase 1: Freeze all organisms into energy clusters. To freeze them you have to arrive at an intersection of web strands before an organism gets there. As it approaches hold down the fire button. Do not touch a painted path the organism leaves behind or touch an organism before it reaches the intersection or you will be sent back to the start of this phase.

Phase 2: Stabilize all energy clusters. Go over them with the fire button. You don't have to be at an intersection for this. Their don't leave a painted path but you do. Touching this sends you back to the start of this phase.

Phase 3: The transitional phase that moves you to the next level with a musical reward. Music, lights and color. A new epoch is about to begin.

The game is viewed in a 3D perspective with the web stretching into the back of the screen. You appear as a note starting right at the front of the screen. You use the joystick to move about the web and use the fire button to enlarge. There are no lives to the game and no end. You finish when you switch it off.

name: iD
description: iD is a video game developed by Mel Croucher and Colin Jones for the ZX Spectrum and published by CRL in 1986. The game is text-based and takes the form of a conversation with an entity that has inhabited the computer. The player's task is to gain the entity's trust and find out what other inanimate objects this entity has inhabited in the past.

name: The Madness of Roland
description: Interactive novel and audiobook with FMV cutscenes that adapts the epic poem Orlando Furioso about medieval French king Charlemagne's heroic paladin Roland who falls tragically in love with sorceress Angelica and loses his mind.

name: Last Resort
description: Last Resort is a small co-op shooter in which you and up to 3 others defend humanity's first hotel on Mars against hostile aliens. Defend & power up generators, upgrade your weapons and gun down hordes of aliens to save the hotel!

name: Starforge
description: Is a strategy game where you will take the role of a race called Terrans.

name: Shoal
description: Hungry for shark games? Start fishing! Go fish for food as a hungry shark swimming in a shoal of fish.

name: Shining Flower: HikaruHana
description: The game follows the journey through a dreamlike or even surreal landscape of a little man holding in his hands a red flower from which emanates a bright light. He will meet strange creatures, who will make him a little in spite of himself visit the nooks and crannies of these unknown countries.

name: Run Away
description: You wake up at the wheel of your wrecked car on the outskirts of a village that seems abandoned. You need to find a toolbox to fix your car, fear in your stomach... So, are you ready for the challenge?

name: Vectors
description: Avoid obstacles and reach the end of each level by controlling the direction of Vectors. Can you manage your actions without going off the tangent?

name: Boom
description: Boom is a logic puzzle game with a relaxing atmosphere, which builds clear links. An exciting new twist on a classic game without the element of guesswork!

name: Tank Battle
description: Drive a tank, destroy enemy, defend your homeland. Act alone or co-op with a friend and have fun!

name: BattleMaster
description: BattleMaster is a traditional turn-based flag game that allows you to prepare for tough battles by equipage, reinforcement, skills, or recruiting new players

name: Chroma
description: Set out on a mission to stop the attacks of the tyrannical machines. Fight your way through a dystopian city and stop them. You are the city's only hope...

name: Bounce
description: Launch your ball into the high-scores in this frantic and stunning physics-based procedurally generated time twister!

name: Pizza Empire!
description: Pizza Empire! is a time management cooking game. Help Giuseppi traveling around the world and beyond, preparing pizzas and delicious dishes. Upgrade your restaurants with new toppings and equipment. Meet interesting people, discover their story, and help them with the power of your food.

name: Fragment
description: Join a boy named Timothy and his alien friend Gus on a journey of self discovery as they explore the colorful world of Fragment.

name: Misplaced
description: Test your skills in a rogue-like FPS survival game, upgrade your arsenal and survive as long as you can!

name: Karate Krab: Karate Krab In Space
description: Karate Krab has culled all crabs on planet Earth, now he points is angry eyes to space! Take on a brand new world. 21 levels with new environments, mechanics and secrets..

name: Color Cube
description: In this puzzle game, your goal is to turn grey cubes into the color of the cube you control. The game is simple and relaxing.

name: Sentry
description: Sentry is an action-defense first person shooter where you defend your spaceship against a relentless alien threat. Use traps, turrets and environmental destruction to repel invading hordes and engage the enemy in fast-paced FPS action across a dynamic singleplayer or co-op campaign.

name: Neon
description: Spin jump and solve puzzles.

name: Luna
description: Play as a little girl named 'Luna', and survive from the dark being while discovering the secrets behind her. The more you traverse on her memory, the more you will discover dark truths that lie deep inside.

name: Runner
description: On Runner, it's your decision what you do. Loot Houses or just live in the wilderness and build your own home. Just do your own thing because in Runner you can't do anything wrong.

name: Project: Nitro
description: In the game you can play alone but you will have a choice to play COOP mode but you can also play online PVP, there is currently one map and one mod in the game, but new updates are released every week.

name: Gravel: King of Buggies
description: Off-road vehicles par excellence, the daredevil Buggies join the race with their quick and nimble handling. Gravel Channel now includes a new Off-road Masters episode where you can put yourself to the test.

name: Gravel: Ice and Fire
description: Gravel Channel lands in Iceland, where it has created a new Off-road Masters episode and new breathtaking Cross Country races. Snow and ice will be your travel companions, from the cold beach to the slopes of an active volcano.

name: Uncle Buddy's Phantom Funhouse
description:
Art "Buddy" Newkirk has disappeared and left you his literary estate. By the looks of it, he and his friends were a very odd bunch. You might have enjoyed knowing them. But you don't: why does "Uncle" Buddy think you do? Where is he, anyway? And what does this have to do with Meister Eckhart and the New York City subway?

To find out, you'll have to pop the floppies into your Mac, drop the tapes into your boombox, and get ready to meet Buddy's friends, read his email, listen to his band, and sort out his (very strange) Tarot deck. Surreal and humorous, this is a world you will often return to and long remember.

name: Great Hunt: North America - Summer Safari
description: A new location, now a summer hunt is available: a green forest, a fast river, who do you think you can find here? And also an addition to the hunter's inventory - a navigator that will help you to quickly find prey and make your hunt even more effective.

name: The Book of Yorle: Save the Kingdom
description: In the final chapter of The Book of Yorle, you must Save the Kingdom and banish the Evil Ones forever! Battle your way through Castle, a hidden Pirate Ship, and Caverns to find the secret lair of the Evil Ones. Complete your book with one of two unique endings - one is only possible if you own all 4 DLCs.

name: Azy
description: Destroy enemies and bosses using a variety of weapons. Visit different times and places with unique enemies. Inspired by classic games from the of 90s genre.

name: Move Forward
description: Move Forward is an atmospheric adventure in the inner world with unique and diverse levels and interesting mechanics!

name: Rise of Three Kingdoms
description: Rise Of Kingdoms is a game with features that connected with strategies and turn-based system. It is also mixed with real historical events and monarchs that appeared in the history.

name: Zombie Alert
description: Zombie Alert is a survival game. Survive by hunting zombies, build your own territory, capture cities and collect items - whether alone or with your friends!

name: Keylogger
description: Each person’s family name in the Continuum is given a debt which they must pay back, or they risk being wiped by the Grid.

name: Press Your Luck
description: The game of Red Light Green Light goes mobile! Tap as many times as you can while the light is green. However, tapping when red means that you've been caught. Beat your high score and challenge the world to be as sneaky as you!

name: September 12th: A Toy World
description:
September 12th is a serious game with a political statement about the USA's War on Terror which started after September 11th 2001.

In the game, the player is presented with a Middle Eastern market place in a top-down isometric view. Walking around the market and the surrounding buildings are innocent civilians - men, women, children, and dogs. There also several terrorist walking among them.

All the player can do is scroll the camera and fire missiles. Missiles will impact on the exact location of the targeting reticule, but with a small delay. Killing a terrorist will remove the terrorist from play. If another civilian encounters his or her body, the civilian will burst into an emotional display and become determined to go on a jihad and thus also become a terrorist. The more civilians you kill the more terrorists come into play.

Buildings also get destroyed when hit by the rather large blast radius of the player's missiles. Civilians surrounding collapsing buildings also die. After a long period of waiting buildings will also slowly be reconstructed again. Terrorists will after a while cool down and become normal civilians again, but a small number of terrorists will always remain terrorists.

name: Darfur is Dying
description: Darfur is Dying is a flash-based browser game about the crisis in Darfur, western Sudan.

name: Rubicon
description: Rubicon is a local multiplayer split-screen party shooter inside an omnidirectional puzzle cube, an action-packed PvP game show where every round has a powerful new weapon and each battle adds a zany new twist.

name: Incarnatia
description: This Japanese game is a fusion of art and games in one place. It involves the 20th century painter Salvador Dali. With his own interpretation, CG artist Shimo Hirokazu has his mysterious art world rebuilt into a three-dimensional world.

name: Dominus
description: Dominus is a turn-based tactics and strategy game with a unique twist. Inspired by strategy legends like Civilization, Dominus focuses that epic 'just one more turn' gameplay into rapid multiplayer mayhem lasting from 5 minute squad battles to epic half-hour struggles between empires.

name: Gratuitous Tank Battles: The Western Front
description: The enemy may be on the back foot, but this war is far from over. Gratuitous Tank Battles just got bigger and better with a 'Western Front' campaign.

name: Bird Boxing
description: Bird Boxing is a chaotic party fighting game about birds punching each other in the skies. Fly, zoom around, and punch other birds and sky creatures in a variety of different game modes both cooperating and competing with your friends.

name: Charge Champs
description: Charge Champs is a 2D platform fighter with a unique combat system where players charge their character to temporarily unlock abilities and gain an advantage over their opponents.

name: How to Survive: El Diablo Islands - Host
description: Download this DLC and venture onto a new set of volcanic Islands: discover new fauna and characters, learn to craft fantastic tools and weapons taking advantage of the different weather effects to face the most surprising enemies.

name: Marcella Moon: Secret on the Hill
description: Follow amateur sleuth Marcella Moon to Ireland to investigate the disappearance of a famous writer.

name: Family Quiz
description: Running out of questions to use during your weekly family video chat quiz night? Look no further...Family Quiz does exactly what name suggests....a quiz for all the family.

name: The Legend of Dark Witch Renovation: Day Stage
description: You can play the Day stage. It is a very difficult stage, so it is recommended to play after all stages have been completed.

name: Die Again: Northern Front
description: Die Again: Northern Front it's the DLC of the game where you can kill by shooting and committing suicide. Travel to 2042 and enter an all-out war to break through enemy lines and sabotage a weapon capable of changing the course of battle. Shoot to kill, die to survive, kill yourself to overcome!

name: Hade: Forbidden Levels
description: DLC with absolutely disturbing and overcomplicated puzzles with hidden details and illogical behavior.

name: Steel Rain: Expeditions
description: Start your Expeditions to Oupost One, Perimeter X and Learis Prime! Discover a new colonizable planets and face a new threat. Fight through 9 new extra long Missions and 10+ new Enemy types with 3 new unlockable Prototype Wings.

name: Neon Abyss: Alter Ego
description: Take on the New Gods with a series of Alter Egos for your Characters.

name: Red Algorithm: Fernando
description: Purchase premium hero Fernando in Red Algorithm to support the game and have some fun

name: Divan Chronicles: Battle for Dancig - Episode 3
description: You can to donate for it, or from the other reason...

name: Pirate Island
description: Pirat Island is a 3D side-scrolling shooter with platformer elements in which you have to start hunting the evil pirates and soulless skeletons that have come to life due to the magic of Voodoo!

name: Maze of Acheron
description: Maze of Acheron is a top-down 2D ruins exploration game with an old-school design philosophy. Explore a large, interconnected world full of treasure and traps, and uncover the long-buried secrets of the Maze of Acheron.

name: FPV Air 2: Bando Freestyler
description: Bando Freestyler makes FPV Air 2 about more than just racing! New environments packed with all the dives, gaps and exciting locations you need for freestyle practice.

name: Fairy Bubble
description: An exciting adventure, but it can be scary for those who are afraid of heights. Free the fairies and show how high you can go.

name: Brain Off
description: Brain Off is a game of hide and seek and catch up on the net. Here a brave hunter tries to catch cunning zombies that hide behind objects and use unique abilities to escape and confuse the hunter. You are welcome to the world of fun and zombies!

name: KingdomDefense
description: A fantasy game that combines Tower defense, MOBA, and RPG elements. Tutorial and five game levels. Single-play only.

name: Professional Farmer 2017: Cattle & Cultivation
description: Delve deeper into your agricultural business with the feature-packed Cattle & Cultivation Expansion for Professional Farmer 2017. Introducing ducks and goats, new crop and new economy cycles. Couple the all-new silage wagon and hay rake, get going and admire your sprouting sunflower fields.

name: Enga Extreme Battle Race
description: Time to battle race

name: Virtual World Primus
description: A virtual world Primus with different cultures and worldviews. At Primus, you can enjoy a life different from the real world. Why don't you come to the virtual world Primus for new encounters and unknown experiences that you really wanted to do? This game is an open world walking simulator.

name: Sweet Dream
description: Welcome to the exciting arcano game "Sweet Dream"! In the 3rd in a Row genre. Are you a lover of sweets and order? Then you're sure to come to us!

name: Kinda Heroes
description: Side-View & Scroll RPG made with love!

name: Escape From Woomera
description: Escape from Woomera is an unfinished point-and-click adventure video game, intended to criticise the treatment of mandatorily detained asylum seekers in Australia as well as the Australian government's attempt to impose a media blackout on the detention centres.

name: Tokyo 42: Smaceshi's Castles
description: This DLC continues your Tokyo 42 experience! Complete Lord Smaceshi's nefarious tests and become the ultimate assassin. Use your stealth, combat and even your parkour skills to become victorious! Features 90 new missions and 4 new weapons.

name: Avorion: Black Market
description: This expansion brings the black market to Avorion. Three underground organizations with their own missions, storylines, tasks and bosses are waiting for you! Meet new characters, visit hidden black markets, trade illegal goods, and get access to new, shady upgrades!

name: Civil War II: The Bloody Road South
description: Civil War II: The Bloody Road South provides players with a grand set of new historical campaigns in the era of the American Civil War. This expansion uses the latest game patch (1.03) for enhanced gameplay and requires ownership of the original Civil War II game.

name: Sonic Riders Regravitified
description: Sonic Riders Regravitified is a mod of Sonic Riders Zero Gravity that attempts to fix the game by making it faster, adding new mechanics, and rebalance and redesign the gears for competitive play.

name: Panic Station
description: After exploring the new planet, the space crew became infected with an unknown virus. After a long epidemic, the space station plunged into chaos. Various mutations took place with the crew of the ship, which clouded their minds. Make your way to the rescue shuttle through the mysterious danger.

name: Deity Quest: Extended
description: The extended edition adds many interesting features on top of the base game, most notably an epilogue to the story and the ability to design custom follower types.

name: 7th Sector: Museum
description: You have the opportunity to wander through the gloomy halls of the 7th Sector museum.

name: Super Meat Shooter: Happy Meat Winter
description: Special DLC adds new thematic levels, new enemies, new skin for shovel and other holiday content.

name: Super Hiking Simulator 2020: After
description: Short TPS game. The game is a free add-on to Super Hiking Simulator 2020.

name: GiAnt: Warfare
description: Experience the world of 'GiAnt' through different eyes! A First Person Shooter from a tiny perspective! Hired by the ants it is down to you to act out vengeance on the aggressive enemies that were seen in the original game!

name: Tales of Escape: Cold As Ice
description: Cold As Ice is another escape room adventure DLC for Tales of Escape, this time taking place in an old butcher's shop in the UK. Can you learn who locked you in here and escape before they come back?!?

name: Dawn of Andromeda: Subterfuge
description: Subterfuge offers a whole new dimension to playing Dawn of Andromeda. The 2 new races, new gameplay mechanics (espionage, planetary projects and fuel range) as well as lots of other new content, add hours of replayability!

name: Quantum Rush Champions: Jump Start Tournament
description: This DLC contains the campaign "Jump Start Tournament" of the Early Access version. It is accessible to all 3 racer manufacturers and offers 5 tiers with many challenges, boss fights and unlocks, which are available only in this DLC!

name: Bun
description: An indie 3D precision platformer. Play as Bun and hop, roll and glide to explore beautiful abstract worlds. Along the way, collect Boop eggs and raise your own ensemble of colorful virtual creatures.

name: Tomorrow Don't Come: Vicious Cycle
description: An all new chapter for Tomorrow Don't Come inspired by feedback from the community. Including 2 hidden achievements!

name: Quantum Conundrum: The Desmond Debacle
description: Power up your Inter-Dimensional Shift Device and get ready for a brand new adventure in an unexplored wing of Quadwrangle Manor. Experience Desmond, the drinking bird, as you've never seen him before in even more brain twisting and complex puzzles! The Desmond Debacle provides hours of inter-dimensional puzzle solving.

name: Tiny Metal: Full Metal Rumble - Caeser's Rescue
description: Wargroove's very own doggy Commander Caesar, bounds and barks his way into the world of Tiny Metal: Full Metal Rumble in a special collaboration with UK-based indie developer Chucklefish. Play as Nora as you and your best buddy Caesar take on a mysterious enemy that... plans to bitify the world?!?

name: Robots, Death & Venice
description: Defeat the Robot Mafia in a dystopian Venice in this thrilling shooting game. Join Fio Bucceri, a former secret agent now turned into a bounty hunter seeking revenge of the Robot Mafia.

name: Construct.AI
description: construct.ai is a heavily story driven adventure, exploration and puzzle game within a unique Sci-Fi setting. Explore diverse biomes, figure out the puzzles and obstacles that lie within and ultimately, unravel the mystery of the AI construct.

name: Skirmish Line: Mad Jack
description: The Great Emu War ended on an uneasy armistice. Now in democracy's darkest hours, the Emu Nation has allied itself with Imperial Japan, declaring open war with the people of the free world. Emu War 2 has begun, and only one man stands in their way, Mad Jack, veteran of the first Emu War.

name: Scrap Bringer
description: A Stylish & Intense Twin-Stick... Puncher! Wake up in an alleyway and get into the scrap of your life as you explore the streets of a gritty/cartoony megacity.

name: RV Renovation
description: Build your dream RV in this incredibly detailed and highly realistic simulation game. Find classic, unique campers, busses, minivans or caravans. Restore them, give them a new look and bring them back to life!

name: Simple Story: Alex - Two Guys
description: This is a new story content. This DLC will tell you the story of of two minor characters from the main game, and how they appeared on the deserted and snowy islands.

name: Tomb Raider: Shanty Town
description: Shanty Town Multiplayer Map: This ramshackle area features steep climbs, multiple ziplines for quick escapes, and deadly traps to set for your enemies (multiplayer map).

name: Darkest Dungeon: The Butcher's Circus
description: The Circus is in town, and the Butcher demands a show! Assemble teams of 4 heroes and compete in the ring in brutal, unforgiving PvP combat against friend and foe. Climb the ranks and show off your prestige while blowing off steam while taking a break from assaulting the Darkest Dungeon below.

name: Beyond Solar
description: Beyond Solar is a bullet hell / SHMUP pixel art game. You play the protagonist “Gravity” a space ship pilot who grew up in the space colony “ARD”, humanity last hope and shelter as planet Earth was on the brink of extinction.

name: Stardrytch
description: Stardrytch is a challenging action-platformer set in a lost world where sci-fi and fantasy collide. Embark on a dangerous journey, discover a forgotten land, unlock mighty powers and battle terrifying monsters to find a way home.

name: Clouds No More
description: This game is a reversed platformer. In the sense that your goal is not to jump on platforms, but to avoid them. In this world you are going to fall. And then die. And then fall again. Faster.

name: The Trolley Problem Game
description: The Trolley Problem Game creates has over 500 different interpretations of The Trolley Problem for the player to solve!

name: Destroy Geometric Shapes
description: Imagine yourself throwing balls to destroy geometric shapes like cubes, triangles, lozenges and hexagons. The big problem is, you need to find the perfect trajectory of the balls for them destroy everything at once. But you are persistent and this is your challenge from now on, can you do it?

name: Agent Simulation
description: If you are a sharpshooter, you would be a great fit for us. Within a short period of time, select 3 options from the list and deal with your enemies. Do not forget that the ability of using time efficiently and aiming your targets are crucial. Complete each mission and earn an agent certification.

name: Jude
description: Explore the deep metroidvania world of Jude as you jump, collect, run for survival, and mentally build strategies to uncover the mysteries behind creation and purpose. Explore through the forests to the the dark side of the bayou and more as you are challenged to open the doors and find answers.

name: Last Days of Lazarus
description: After their mother's suicide, Lazarus returns home to his sister Lyudmila. But unexplained events make the world and even reality collapse around him. Looming death, a spreading malediction and the supernatural threaten his sanity, yet Lazarus pushes forward to find the truth about his family.

name: Warbanners: Death Speaker
description: Become the leader of a powerful Orc clan, and claim everything that is rightfully yours! The ancient dwarven ruins are waiting for you to invade them, earn your ascension through combat, and share the power of the Two Gods!

name: The Spirit
description: The Spirit is a simple Action RPG with elements of old school dungeon crawlers. Creatures and Demons are entering through the Rift. The people of the realm need you, but so does your family.

name: MindGym
description: MindGym is a surreal game about creative thinking.

name: Counter Fight Ichiran
description: Cook some knockout noodles! "Counter Fight Ichiran" is an all-new cooking game made with input from popular ramen store, Ichiran. Ichiran is a famous organic tonkotsu ramen chain with 85 outlets in Japan, often touted as a "must-try cuisine" for tourists. Fulfill orders to get a high score!

name: Smash Up: Pretty Pretty
description: Add four new adorable factions to your Smash Up collection, with cute Kitty Cats, beautiful Princesses, enchanting Fairies and magical Mythic Horses!

name: PostZ: Zombies VR
description: Get straight to the action with quick access, easy to pick up and hard to master gameplay. Consecutive headshots give an increasingly large bonus point reward. Zombies are moving in from every angle so scan your surroundings to find your next target before it finds you!

name: Medicinal Herbs: Cannabis Grow Simulator
description: Do you have a green thumb and always wanted to grow Cannabis? With Medicinal Herbs you can virtually simulate the cultivation. Make the finest medical Cannabis for your patients. From simple cellars to professional cultivation, everything is possible.

name: DemonCrawl: Arena Plus
description: Upgrade your DemonCrawl Arena experience with a permanent AP boost, extra mastery and homeland slots, emotes, and customizable sign messages!

name: Crazy Fun Ball
description: Competitive Platformer

name: Curse of the Deadwood
description: In this action-packed fantasy adventure game, prepare to embark on a fantastical journey as Lathe and Roguard. The gameplay is a unique evolution of the twin-stick genre. You control both characters at once, making simultaneous ranged and melee attacks a core element of the game's thrilling combat.

name: Carma
description: Out drive your friends in fast, arcade-style vehicle combat, using power-ups, killstreaks, and the environment to smash your foes! Battle across a miniature world, avoiding dangers and earning the gods favour to level up and unlock a wide range of customisables to help you stand out from the crowd.

name: Mushroom Wars 2: Episode 3 - Red & Furious
description: Feel the girls power in the sequel of Mushrooms journey and explore new lands, new bosses, new heroes and a lot of other new stuff in this epic DLC!

name: Duo Defenders
description: Cute and cooperative tower defense game where you and your partner must reload towers with ammunition together.

name: Magia X: Leta
description: The Real Fantasy 2D Action, Magia X. Splendid actions beyond the limits of 2D, unique characters, breathtaking adventures, and warm pastel-colored world awaits you. Stimulate your action urges.

name: Theomachiae
description: Play as giant monsters and fight! Sow destruction and chaos in destructible environments! And compete against other players in local or online multiplayer.

name: Kyoki
description: Kyoki takes the concept of original goal board games and makes it more fun to play every day. Kyoki is a three mode board sport. In Kyoki the aim of the game is to clear the play area of all the coloured tiles.

name: Offroad Racing on Line
description: Drift, slide, skid! Offroad Racing Online is the isometric 3D perspective car racing game that makes racing funnier than ever.

name: Regalia: Of Men and Monarchs - Paragons and Pajamas
description: Get in touch with the yet unknown parts of Rashytil! So far you've only heard about Minwe and Armelisse, but now you can get into a proper fight with them and... tell them off in a nasty letter.

name: Goblin Takes No Argument[s]
description: In this retro style tower defence, we have created a short experience for all of you seeking a true Atari-like experience.

name: Dungeons of Dredmor: Conquest of the Wizardlands
description: Deep within the pocket dimensions of the Wizardlands, the mighty Wizardkings plunge their hands greedily into their stashes of magical wizarding booze, desperately searching for more mana. Their time has passed, and they have faded into the drunken myths of obscurity.

name: Ostalgie: The Berlin Wall - Legacy of Hoxha
description: The world is changing, but Albania is not. The covenants of Enver Hoxha are honored with all responsibility and authority. But how long will this last in the world of the end of the Cold War? Albanian Gorbachev, Islamic socialism or still aligned to Hoxha? So many ways... And the choice is in your hands.

name: Resistance
description: The command gave the task of downloading information from the servers of the impregnable enemy base at any cost. How to do it? Everything depends on you.

name: Viking Idle
description: Breathtaking Dual Prestige System Idle Clicker of Doom and Darkness!

name: Meteorfall: Krumit's Tale - Varfa the Ranger
description: From deep in the Slithering Swamp, Varfa the Ranger and her loyal companion, Orhu, have answered the call to defeat the Uberlich!

name: Story of a Tiny Earth: The Symbolic Ages
description: Deliciously retro ! Spherical and labyrinthine levels full of traps and mysteries, with actions, puzzles and strategies. Find your own way, escaping malicious opponents and defending biodiversity !

name: Block Busters: Local Party
description: This DLC contains :Local Play!All Cosmetics present & future!.. and our eternal love!

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed - Bonus Quest
description: This DLC will add additional quests to Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed.

name: Splendor: The Strongholds
description: In Splendor: The Strongholds, you build strongholds to reserve cards and block your opponents, or destroy those of other players to slow their progress. Discover an entirely new way to play Splendor's strategic scenarios in this expansion!

name: On Pixels: A Lights Out Game
description: Turn on the lights and light up your life! This game is a variation of the "Lights Out" games of the 90s. Each light you turn on changes the state of the adjacent lights. Can you turn on all the lights?

name: Outsp4ce
description: Our tiny green triangle tries to destroy enemies in the shape of red circles that are approaching our world by shooting them.

name: Me vs. You
description:
Me vs. You is a competitive Indie 3D Third-Person Action game. Different unique Arenas will require a different skill-set to master them. The Arenas are either prebuilt (Challenges) or customized (use of randomization to avoid that players just memorize the "flow" of the level to get an advantage) and can be played alone or against friends.
The vision is to provide a game that is purely skill-based and that allows you to constantly improve them, find your skill-cap and measure them against others.

name: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim - Halloween
description: New wares just in time for the Halloween season.

name: Kujlevka
description: A flying saucer crash-lands in a distant Russian village, turning a rundown kolkhoz into the first, thin bridge between civilizations. As the first point of contact, you must dictate how this encounter unfolds and ultimately determine history’s outcome.

name: Into the Timeverse
description: Into the Timeverse is a hard non forgiving action platformer game. Into the Timeverse is a constant"runner" game that you need to match your color to the appropriate color of the enemy platforms. Expect to die a lot in this game.

name: Virtual Rehab Art 4 Health
description: VR designed for awe and rehab. The experience combines virtual art, technology, and rehabilitation. When we, in reality, are contained to our home or hospital room. We can in the VR experience wonder in redwoodforest or oceanscapes. A remarkable intersection between art, pain relief, and exercise.

name: Knuckers Test Fight
description: Knuckers Test Fight is a couch fighting game with funny characters, cute costumes, various weapons, tricky levels, and mini-games.

name: Soul Recursion
description: Soul Recursion is a story focused hack and slash challenging you to explore and uncover the mysteries hidden amongst utopian ruins.

name: Barn Finders VR
description: Put on your VR and discover a whole new Barn Finders’ experience! Feel how is it like to work alongside Uncle Billy…if you dare!

name: Void Encounter
description: Void Encounter is a 3D FPS alternative to currently very popular impostor-hunt games. Void Encounter takes that concept a bit further and features creepy level design, lighting features and random or impostor-initiated events.

name: Barrel Blast
description: Soar through Cannon City by blasting out of cannons, bounce off rubber balls and walls, slide down giant slides, and pull off aerodynamic acrobats in this physics cannon blasting game. Get sky-high today with some silly physics fun!

name: War Theatre: Blood of Winter - Beak and Talon
description: Add Gaten, the Crow Knight, and Vincenzo, the Doctor, to your roster! This DLC includes single-player campaigns for Gaten and Vincenzo, and unlocks both characters permanently for use in multiplayer.

name: Boinihi: The Ki Codex
description: Visit the moon of Boïnihi. An exiled Talifan hermit has left a mysterious Codex for his future visitors. A new scifi episode in the Black Cube series, this time inspired by the famous Voynich manuscript.

name: Super Dream Dasher
description: Dash and roll through a charming world in this fast-paced, momentum-based, fun-filled platformer! Uncover the mysteries surrounding the destruction of this peaceful planet and leave no tasty turnUp behind!

name: Goblin.Life
description: Imagination with friends. Forge playable 3D worlds in real time, script them with astral Glyphs, and fill them with adorable Goblins.

name: Arms Race: TCWE - Industrialization
description: DLC Industrialization brings a new experience of economic cooperation between allied and neutral countries in an Arms Race: TCWE game.

name: Eclipse
description: Once upon a time gods sent you here. You’ve slept in a glass sarcophagus for hundrends of years. When people find themselves on the brink of extinction, you’ll have to wake up. Now, the time has come. Get up and save the medieval village from the monsters coming from the abandoned dungeons!

name: Mission Idle
description: Mission Idle is an idle game where your main focus is to grind for levels gold and other riches that will allow you to move further in the zone stages. Mission Idle is played by being AFK. Most of the mechanics in the game are automated.

name: Trapped Summoner: Taigren's Secrets
description: The underground of the Tigren Castle has new secrets!Find out what other dangers are prepared for you by the inhabitants of this labyrinth!

name: Turdy
description: Play as Turdy the Turtle, (what kind of name is that...) as he traverses the vast open world. Collect coins and discover secret items, pets, passages, levels, costumes, and more while meeting some interesting characters along the way.

name: A Sad Journey
description: A wonderful third-person adventure game about a rabbit looking for his missing parents. In this journey you will search for Paws that will take you to special places where you will get your memories back.

name: Cassius
description: Cassius is a first-person story-driven puzzle game exploring the mysteries of Blackhaven Hall, a sprawling historically accurate colonial estate evacuated at the height of the American Revolution. Journey back to the 1781 and decode the dark secrets lurking behind America's founding.

name: Synthwave Hop
description: Synthwave Hop, a hardcore game made for people who enjoy a challenge, and speed running. A game where time is your friend and your enemy. No complicated story, just speed and frustration. Can you be the fastest runner?

name: Sheriff Rage
description: Sheriff on guard for the defense of Oldstone city against extraterrestrial forces

name: Champoo Club
description: Champoo Club is a challenging action game with arena fighting, involving sword, missile and cute characters.

name: Mario Bros.
description:
The first port of Mario Bros. was developed by Nintendo for the Famicom and later released in American under the Arcade Classics series. It follows most of the features of the arcade game, and adds a difficulty setting.
This version would be the most re-released version in future consoles.

name: The Little Drone 2
description: You are a little drone sent to investigate a debris field on the edge of Dark Space in a lost world behind the Bermuda Triangle, that seems to be caught in some kind of state of flux. You must collect all Data Nodes lost there so that their data can be retrieved by your makers back in Cloud Space.

name: Turbo Machines Mini Racing
description: Drift, slide, skid ! Turbo Machines Mini Racing let you drive 14 cars on 18 tracks, single, local mutiplayer or on line multiplayer.

name: Sky Goddess
description: "Sky Goddess" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game with nostalgic movie images.

name: Country Desert Simulator: Addon SUV
description: Welcome to the first DLCs for the Country Desert Simulator that allows you to drive a SUV into the desert. Realistic textures and sounds expect you. One amazing feature expect you to create your own repaint for better looking.

name: 3D Math: Ultra
description: 3D Math: Ultra is both simple and complex challenges!

name: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim 2
description: The apocalypse is in full swing! Date Elder Gods, win back the Dreamlands - and all of reality as you know it - in this cosmic horror-comedy RPG.

name: Timore Redo
description: Timore Redo is a psychological horror game about sadness.

name: Dragon's Tower
description: An old-style pixel 2D platformer who becomes an apprentice swordsman, confronts dragons and rescues princesses. You can easily enjoy your adventure with simple operations such as jumping and dashing attacks. Enjoy the world of charming enemy characters, items that grow apprentice swordsmen, and a simple and nostalgic game world.

name: Black Sun
description: Command your neural-network-powered assistant to fly a space ship through a 2D open world. Fight real-time space battles, upgrade your vessel and solve the conspiracy behind the Black Sun. Or if you decide so - just enjoy transporting space-made peach pastries.

name: A World Abandoned
description: Explore an abandoned planet, find upgrades, build your character and reveal the truth about what happened to the planet and its people.

name: Conjuntalia: MecaEnglish
description: he survives by writing transport vehicles and gains knowledge in the use of English and typing, with Egos and his friends.

name: Ouroboros Dungeon
description: All the pleasure from the 90's Action RPGs put into a quirky infinite procedural dungeon. Explore, find treasures, loot and clear hallways from enemies within.

name: Siege Up!
description: A classical full-featured RTS in low-poly style. Fantasy story-driven campaign, multiplayer, editor, cooperative missions. Build a city, walls, research technologies, capture resources to obtain advantage. Attack an opponent with melee, rangers, siege weapon and battle ships and come to VICTORY!

name: Dros
description:
Discover the world of Dros, a beautifully detailed story-driven adventure about a slimy little creature and her human bounty hunter shell.

Little Dros and Captain both have different strengths and weaknesses and you’ll switch between them to solve puzzles, fight off enemies and sneak through a vast steampunk Tower.

The world of Dros features a fantasy story with a huge cast of odd and interesting characters to interact with. Unravel the mysteries within the Tower as you explore, unlock journal entries and collect strange alchemical treasures.

name: Senko no Ronde 2: Rounder Lili
description: Use Lili and her rounder, Brinsta, in Arcade, Online and Offline Battle modes.

name: Secrets of Magic 3: Happy Halloween
description: Dive in this spooky adventure through a magical land and help Victoria make the best Halloween display the School of Magic has ever seen! Match your way through charms and challenges in this phantasmal Match 3 game.

name: The Devil's Luck
description: A psychological horror experience situated in an apartment, with puzzles and scares to mess with your mind, alongside therapeutic rain sounds!

name: Cyber Manhunt: Home Sweet Home
description: Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?!

name: Assignment 42
description: You’re the new CONTROLLER.The AI know that, and they’ll probably tease you, the machine derps. Don’t be concerned, though. The instant there’s an assignment on the projector, they are ready to follow their program. Every literal command you set.

name: Red Tether
description: Red Tether is an action-packed "combat-puzzle" roguelite. You will tear apart massive space fleets, using nothing but your advanced tether harpoons. Pull and crash ships into another, rip their components off, then grapple-swing your way out of danger.

name: Zeliria Sanctuary: Rise of Pumpkins
description: More adventures of Special Forces soldier Maxx on a distant planet Zeliria.

name: Shadows of Adam: Guild of the Artificers
description: Thrilling Battle Arena, Artifact Crafting, New Game Plus, and a new super optional dungeon! All complete with tons of new items and artifacts. Are you up for the challenge? This exciting DLC pack to Shadows of Adam awaits you!

name: RoboDo
description: RoboDo is a singleplayer/multiplayer VR puzzle game with plenty exciting features. Bunch of levels for you to complete, some are fast, reaction based and others will make you concentrate and think. Beat levels alone or join your friend for some Co-Op action!

name: Halloween Night Mahjong 2
description: A Halloween atmosphere in every level! Ready to fight a mighty sorceress! Complete 120 unique levels of Mahjong!

name: Cute Lady
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Massage Salon Story: Spring Breeze
description: Customers of all personalities are waiting for you here. You can tempt your customers with different massage techniques and positions to satisfy their desires. Of course, it is important to work hard to earn money. So Work hard and enjoy the life!

name: Beautiful Girls
description: Relaxing puzzle game with beautiful girls

name: FartPart
description: Fart Part-Arcade game with toilet humor will not let you get bored. Resorting to the sharpness of the mind and the reaction of the mongoose, you must press the button at the right moment and spew out extra gases from the hero, which will give him the right push and add speed to further flight.

name: Ultra Resort Keroncuel
description: Ultra Resort Keroncuel is an exploration-oriented FMV adventure game. The player is transported to a fantastic space resort and given free reign to explore and enjoy the beautiful surroundings. There is only a light story and some gentle puzzles; the focus is on exploration and relaxation instead of problem-solving.

name: Solenars Edge II: Champions
description: Create your character, pick your ally and assemble a powerful team of over 70 champions. Fight your way through the VR Arena and become the greatest champion of the entire universe.

name: Divinity: Original Sin II - Definitive Edition: Companion - Sir Lora the Squirrel
description: Sir Lora is a squirrel fleeing the Knights of Drey - an apocalyptic order of furry knights who believe in the coming of the Great Acorn. He’ll join you in Fort Joy (along with his undead cat mount).

name: Hunting Simulator 2: A Ranger's Life
description: In this new scripted campaign, join Dexter in his daily duties as a forest ranger.

name: Beat the Nightmare: Evil Dreams Simulator VR
description: One day, your life changed completely – going to sleep has become something you dread. You get a horrible nightmare every time. The only way to stop them is to find an exit out of each. 17 unique horror dreams and terrifying experiences are waiting for you. Dreams have no limits...

name: Game-Kun: Input Challenge
description: Game-Kun: Input Challenge is a reaction-based hiscore mini game. Test your reflexes and input skills with your gamepad. Unlock skins and other characters to enhance the fun! Can you reach the final level and compete for the ultimate hiscore?

name: Space Nations: Battlearena
description: A Space Nations: Battlearena is a video-game that blends the survival, space simulator, and scavenging elements with last-man-standing gameplay.

name: Lo-Fi Lounge
description: A lounge for meeting others and vibing out to live Lofi and Retrowave.

name: Wildfall
description: Explore new islands, find hidden treasures and fight off a huge variety of different monsters. Help the once in peace living island dwellers regain control over a huge area what once belonged to them in this First-Person-Coop RPG!

name: Touhou Big Big Battle: Yuyuko's Food-hunting Adventure
description: Touhou Big Big Battle:Yuyuko's Food-Hunting Adventure: Adventure Mode Expansion

name: Partisans 1941: Back Into Battle
description: Fighting the invaders is like fighting a hydra: you cut off one head, and in its place two new ones immediately grow. But that’s no reason to give up! Return to the Eastern Front in this DLC featuring customizable scenarios, new maps and a new game mode!

name: Super Mario Bros. S: Road to Infinity
description: Run as far as you can in an infinitely-generating level! Collect coins and moons to buy powerups such as the iconic fire flower and ice flower and the custom blade star, and defeat both familiar and custom enemies to earn more time. As you run, you'll face increasingly dangerous foes and obstacles, so be prepared!

name: Traphouse Druglord
description: A drug dealer simulator. Deal with paying rent. Buying supplies. Police, rival gangs trying to rob you, while buying and making drugs to sell them and fund this plan to get to paradise.

name: 12 is Better than 6: The Apostles
description:
The DLC on the main story of "12 is Better than 6" is right around the corner!
Meet 3 new characters with their own story campaigns and different gameplay: Bill Watt, Indian Warrior and Slippery Pitt.

name: Street Karate: 2
description: New character, a new mission and lots of new enemies. In this sequel of Street Karate you will make good use of your fighting skills.

name: AEther Heist
description: Plunder magic from the anonymously-owned public internet in this Roguelite Twin-Stick Shooter. Use the essence you steal to research new weapons or augment the ones you already have, to better battle against the network defenses and steal even more power.

name: VR Black Hole Travel Hypothesis
description: In this VR Black Hole Travel Hypothesis game, you can have an immersive experience to travel through a black hole. What kind of unknown world did you reach after crossing? Start your adventure.

name: Airport Simulator 3: Day & Night
description: The airport is a place that never sleeps. With departures, arrivals and the continuous hustle and bustle of passengers, there is rarely an opportunity for a break.

name: Mario Bros. Classic Serie
description: Mario Bros. Classic Serie is an European exclusive version of Mario Bros., released in 1993. It is very faithful to the arcade original, but is built upon the changes made in Kaettekita Mario Bros., removing the extra mode it had.

name: Eternal Dreamers: Anna, the Blood Driver
description: Wake Anna from her slumber to make her powerful abilities your own! Consumed by a deep blood lust, Anna feeds on the life of your foes while replenishing her own.

name: Blood & Gold: Caribbean! - The Zombiest Adventures
description: What would happen if a zombie apocalypse had occurred in 1650? Controlling a small group of survivors, you will have to do road robbery, hunt for gunpowder and constantly search for food. Welcome to The Zombiest Adventures!

name: Asteroid Five
description: Asteroid Five is a first person space exploration game where you investigate the inner caves of an asteroid passing by your planet. Aboard your ship, dive into the deeps of the asteroid, collecting information and samples of the many beautiful minerals and lifeforms who call this place home. Perhaps, somewhere you can even discover remains of an ancient intelligent species long forgotten.

name: The Book of the Game
description: A turn-based open-world RPG, based loosely on the books of the same name.

name: Run! Grandpa! Run!
description: Just another boring day in the hospital? Not on your watch! Take on the role of Grandpa, grab your best slippers and embark on an epic race for freedom in a rocket-powered wheelchair.

name: Crusader's Dynasty
description: Crusader's Dynasty is a medieval/fantasy battle royale and Capture the flag game where you can play as different champions, kill bosses and find better loot.

name: Tora Tora!
description: Tora Tora! is an air combat simulator, based on the conflict of the Pacific Ocean in WW2. An Indie development that aims to bring the player to live the experience of those pilots. through intuitive game dynamics and a special graphic style.

name: League of Angels: Heaven's Fury
description: League of Angels: Heaven's Fury is a revolutionary 3D online action RPG that takes place in a fantastical world loosely based on Western mythology.

name: Chickenman
description: Be Chickenman and punch those sheep! Old fashioned arcady fun!

name: Batla: Tank
description: Tank DLC give access to most massive class of robots, Tank! This race is considered to be tough and brutal. He is bigger than the rest, he has more health and armor, but he is slower. His ability, Charge, compensates for this feature. Skillful player will be able both to run away and to catch up the enemy using this ability.

name: Clanfolk
description: Clanfolk is a medieval colony sim set in the Scottish Highlands. Harness your environment to survive - fish, gather, hunt, and farm as you prepare for the harsh winter. Build an inn, trade with other clans, have children and marry them off - live life and prosper across the generations.

name: Christmas Movie Bingo
description: Prepare to take your Christmas movie night to the next level of fun with Chrismas Movie Bingo. See if you can spot enough Chrismas film tropes to get 5-in-a-row!

name: Academy of Magic: Lair of the Beast
description: Join the young magician Dennis and his freinds in this magical match-3 game, to save a kidnapped student from a monstrous beast.

name: Stolen Eggs
description: Stolen Eggs is a Top Down 2D game. In the person of a mercenary, you need to save an endangered species, and return the last eggs to their parents. Go around the planets and collect eggs, just be careful, your ship does not always want to wait for the end of the collection.

name: Amnon's Beginning
description: A battle that commends for the mind, will the mind be successful or unsuccessful in maintaining it's stability? Build your settlement and fight off the invader of this spiritual realm with real-time strategy.

name: Naughty Memories: Asian Beauty
description: Enjoy the classic card match gameplay with high quality, realistic, sexy girls gone wild! This new series of Naughty Memories features a new theme with the hottest Asians.

name: Ungeon
description: Fight your way through a cursed dungeon filled to the brim with undead enemies in hopes of finding your lost father, or at least your way out. Ungeon is a randomly generated dungeon crawler with a large focus on combat and exploration.

name: Darkened Glory
description: Darkened Glory is an epic fantasy action game where each player fights for glory of a darkened age in a mythical land.

name: Find the Cubs
description: In Find the Cubs you need to find your 5 cubs! They are hidden around the maps. The calm music helps you find the cubs.

name: Narcissu: Zero
description: This is a story about two kids growing up. About the wall between those leaving, and those left behind. It is about the origins of the Seventh Floor hospice. And finally, the origins of "the rules".

name: The Chaos Gene
description: The Chaos Gene is a Indie casual fighting game. Inspired by some of the classic fighting games I grew up playing in the arcades.

name: It's Not About the End
description: It's Not About the End is a short story inspired by David Wehle's game Home is Where One Starts. While recalling good memories of your childhood, explore the map in search of parts for the car that was left by a loved one for you.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki I KAI - Thors Military Academy 1204
description: The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki role-playing game series is highly acclaimed by gamers all over the world for its elaborate character portrayals and epic storyline. The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki and The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki II have sold over 1 million copies in total.

name: Eliminate Drips
description: A brainstorming game relax you.

name: Unlock the Cat
description: You need to move all the stones which prevent the little kitten.

name: Polaris Sector: Lumens
description: The Lumens expansion pack will bring brand new features to the overall game, like new race-specific sciences, ships role assignment and updated planets properties, for an enhanced gameplay experience!

name: Space Fox Kimi: A Very Kimi Christmas
description: It's that time of year where humans celebrate the special holiday known as "Christmas". This year however, is different. It is the first year that mankind has a group of special guests from another world. What will the visitors from the Galactic Foxian Empire do in this holy night?

name: Feudalia
description: Feudalia is a deck building and resource card game. Discover how to be a feudal lord and manage the new territories of the kingdom with the help of your vassals. A fun card game that will make you the master of three fiefdoms, make them grow by taking advantage of your card skills.

name: Seditionis: Tower Defense
description: Seditionis - Tower Defense is a sci-fi based infinite TD game with 190+ upgrades to make your gameplay, units, and towers more powerful. 4 tiers of towers in each line, with 20 upgrade levels each. An introductory story gives you a sense of what you're fighting for. After all, this galaxy needs you.

name: Yolka
description: A Game inspired in the saga souls, with an open world to explore and some animals to hunt.

name: Knockout League: Heavy Bag
description: Introducing the newest Knockout League training game, the Heavy Bag! In this new training game, you will target different areas on the Heavy Bag with vicious combinations of punches as Doug tests your accuracy, speed, power, and endurance. Keep your workout towel handy, you’ll be working up a sweat!

name: Steel Division: Normandy 44 - Back to Hell
description: Steel Division: Normandy 44 - Back to Hell is bringing a whole new realm of gameplay to one of 2017’s biggest RTS titles.

name: Gretchen: Queen of Crows
description: Gretchen: Queen of Crows is a 2D Action/Adventure that follows Gretchen and Baldrek the crow. Use Gretchen's gift of fire, and Baldrek's magic abilities to jump, glide, dash, and battle through beautifully twisted and fairy-tale-like fantasy environments full of demonic folk-lore inspired creatures.

name: Tankocracy
description: Tankocracy is a tank tactical Top-Down shooter inspired by games like Desert Strike and Battletech on Mega Drive. You'll lead your mercenary company to the success by completing hardcore contracts.

name: Game Tengoku CruisinMix Special: Homura Banto
description: Homura Banto joins the team from Jaleco's classic baseball series: Bases Loaded. A new character, exclusive music track and new entry to the Data Mode HD library are yours to enjoy!

name: Life of Ocean
description: In life of ocean, you will start from a desert island.you must do what you can to survive.when you don't need to worry about food or clothing, there are countless treasures waiting for you under the ocean.take the Treasure Map you found, camposs and shovel, become the richest adventurer!

name: RescueTeam
description: A single player TPS game where you must go on a rescue mission and return undercover agents to safety. Explore open world maps , collect coins , buy weapons and reach the highest score possible. Multi player mode , a TDM game with 2 teams fighting each other for the win .

name: Ascendum
description: Help 2 twin vessels on their journey through the afterlife! Overcome platforming and mind-bending puzzle challenges, and defeat scary enemies and bosses while controlling both characters at the same time or working together with another player in local Co-op.

name: Gods of the Twilight
description: Cyberpunk Ragnarök in visual novel form! Gods of the Twilight is a multi-season episodic visual novel that puts you in the shoes of two reincarnated gods facing a pending apocalypse. Decide how to handle the supernatural and human organizations that each have their own plans for you, while ancient truths about you and your companions start to resurface.

name: Librarian
description: The Librarian will take you on an epic adventure!

name: Gold Rush: The Game - Frankenstein Machinery
description: Attention, attention! Gold prospectors from all plots, unite! The large delivery is heading towards the Shop with Heavy Equipment. You will find machines that will change the concept of gold mining.

name: A Story of Merchant
description: A Story of Merchant is a 2D side-scrolling, Action-RPG, Set in an The old Town of Ayotha.

name: Pathfinder 08
description: Pathfinder 08 is a fun and challenging adventure. It is a platform game with a focus on exploration and retro inspiration with some RPG elements.

name: Craft & Survive
description: Are you ready to survive in a zombie apocalypse world with your friends? Virus is spreading in the open world and undead zombies are everywhere. Now you need to use all your survival and shooting skills to stop them! Prepare yourself for FPS game - Craft & Survive.

name: Sapper
description: In Sapper, you play a small anti-pirate. mine-sapper unit. Cleanse local home vessels and exotic alien craft of enemies, mines, and watch vast ships ride to safety as you collect your bounty.

name: Corsairs Legacy
description: Corsairs Legacy is an open-world RPG pirate game in which you will immerse yourself in a perilous adventure. Solve the conflict in Barbados, being in the heart of intrigue, open up to new adventures and become a thunderstorm of the archipelago!

name: Bullet Wave
description: Bullet Wave is a driving first-person shooter straight out of the 90s. Go to the space station to fight against hordes of zombies, combat drones and infernal evil spirits.

name: Aeon's End: The Nameless
description: The Nameless expansion includes 2 new nemeses to defeat, 1 new breach mage, as well as new gems, relics, and spells for the market.

name: Light Pursuer
description: The map will be displayed only when there is light, otherwise it will be dark and the player can only go to the place with light. The player can push the lighthouse to illuminate other parts of the map, so as to explore different parts of the map.

name: Battle Arena VR
description: Battle Arena VR is a multiplayer arena shooter, where you are automatically matched with opponents. Challenge yourself, challenge everyone in a deathmatch Battle Arena!

name: Tunnel Vision
description: Tunnel Vision is a Retro Space shooter that harkens back to the early 80s Arcades. Fun simple addictive gameplay.

name: Button Lock
description: Navigate through a series of intricate—or possibly incredibly simple—mazes. But beware, as you are only given a certain number of moves to work with. You must make the most of your surroundings and discover unconventional pathways in order to proceed in this head-scratching puzzle game.

name: Life of Trophy
description: This work explores the current achievement culture in a humorous way.A variety of game modes, including role-playing, shooting, etc., and can freely choose the order of play, achieve multiple game endings, and experience various platform achievement systems.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Night Road: Usurpers and Outcasts
description: "Usurpers and Outcasts" unlocks the options to play as Tremere and Caitiff.

name: Lost Islands
description: Explore this survival and exploration RPG game that combines adventure, escape, fantasy. All in one game!

name: Rogueslide
description: Swiping puzzle meets dungeon-crawler in Rogueslide, a casual strategy game for desktop and mobile.

name: Alone
description: Alone is a puzzle platformer where you control more than just one character. Switch control between a variety of bots, each with their own unique features, to help overcome increasingly more difficult challenges.

name: Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair - Sting Shot
description: A new shotgun developed for use against giant creatures. For that purpose, it uses special bullets designed to penetrate several thick, oversized hides without missing a beat.

name: Tales of Escape: Illusion (VR)
description: Trapped inside your own mind, inside your own dream! Your guard is gone for 2 hours and you have to find the antidote and return to reality so you can escape!

name: In Marte: The First Moon
description: In the game on Mars, Dom wakes up in a ship without knowing very well where he is, nor why he is there, much less where his body ended up. Help Dom find answers and have fun in this mind-blowing adventure.

name: Retro War
description: Retro War is a 2D shooting videogame. In this game you must pilot a ship, dodge obstacles and enemy ships to finally reach your destination and move to the next level.

name: Theogony: Crystal Water Blue
description: A monster taming game crossed with tactical grid based combat and open exploration.

name: Henry Stickmin: Completing the Mission
description: Completing the Mission is 3x bigger than Fleeing the Complex and features 16 Endings and 164 Fails!

name: The Witch Doctor
description: Lua is a Witch Doctor, a mutated magician that helps those in need, though they only repay her with disdain and prejudice. As one of the last of her kind, Lua finds out a fellow magician has evil plans to ressurrect the Gigantos, she takes it upon herself to stop the rogue magician.

name: Revolution Diabolique
description: Unlock diabolical magic in the time of Napoleon and Robespierre! Can you direct the course of the Revolution, or will you lose your head?

name: Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego?
description: Carmen Sandiego is up to her thieving high-jinks again. While children travel the globe to track her down they learn about geography, history and world cultures.

name: Furries & Scalies: Super Scary Halloween Spooky Times Part II
description: Manage a Halloween store. Maybe destroy Christmas. It's all up for grabs in this light Halloween Store Simulator.

name: Starmind
description: Kill it. Take its gun. Rinse and repeat. WARNING: You will die. A lot. Probably. This 2D Retro shooter is about as hard as it can get, but repetition and good luck will cut though everything like warm cheese. This game grows with the community, and more bosses will challenge you in the future.

name: Afghanistan '11: Royal Marines
description: Royal Marines brings back the winning formula of Afghanistan ’11 and innovates on it with plenty new features. A new campaign, a new faction, plenty new units, civilian vehicles, car bombs, roadblocks, Afghan police…

name: Epejsodion Dodgeball Attack
description: Time to hit the parquet! Epejsodion Dodgeball is a sports game, where YOU can lead over 100 powerful teams to victory! Play an extensive singleplayer campaign, hone your skills, then beat your friends!

name: End Up
description: End Up Demo Story is Based on an Agent, Veer Who is Going on a Mission to Save the Human Life's. But this will not be Easy Task for Him. Because Unexpecting Difficulties are will be there for Him On His Way.

name: Soldier Warfare
description: Action shooter game with tactical combat and realistic gameplay experence.

name: Secret of the Magic Crystals: The Race
description: The Secret of the Magic Crystals: The Race is a multiplayer expansion for the original game which allows to race with your favourite horse against players around the world or the computer. Ride your horses from the main game and ace on three different tracks. Special power-ups will aid you to win!

name: Franky the Bumwalker: Reborn
description: Franky the Bumwalker: Reborn is an adventure game featuring quirky hero traveling in unique and fun world.

name: Shadow Ninja: Apocalypse - Endless Runner
description: Endless version randomly choosed levels. Stay on the platform as long as you can, on your way there will be many obstacles and rogue ninja's. Dodge these obstacles to increase your score.

name: Radio Commander: Squad Management
description: Get closer to your men and make the Vietnam War even more personal. Learn your subordinates' stories and backgrounds from an illustrated glossary. Keep your men alive so they gain experience, perks and awards, that influence your platoons' stats. Promote, enlist and discharge.

name: Time Travel Shanty
description: Jump back and forth through time to explore maze-like ruins, dodge the attacks of undead guardians, loot their treasures and defeat tough bosses in this top-down, metroidvania inspired, action-platformer.

name: Golden Boy
description: Golden Boy is a 2D platformer packed with monsters and everyone's favorite gold. You need to help the boy collect all the gold in the levels, as well as get rid of annoying bubbles and bats. Sleight of hand and more!

name: Heavy Metal Babes
description: Heavy Metal Babes is a turn-based RPG strategy game featuring classic mechanics infused with steamy H-Scenes and an engaging action-packed gameplay. Build your team of hot XEN units, command them into battle and defeat your opponents!

name: Spirit of Europe: Origins
description: An edutainment jRPG experience, spanning from ancient Greece to the 12th century European Renaissance, brimming with historically-accurate characters and events, experienced through two realms: of spirits, thoughts and emotions, and the material world.

name: Centurion Rex
description: Command legions of dinosaur-riding roman riflemen in this historically accurate RTS.

name: WC
description: Hospital. Today, a lot of visitors. Among them there is a small boy with a bladder problem. Suddenly, he longed to the toilet. The main thing is not to be mistaken the door.

name: Myriad: A Rogue Adventure
description: Myriad is an Action-Adventure game with Roguelite elements. Play as a new character each run, loot tons of weapons, and fight hordes of enemies in a randomly generated world.

name: Outrevenge
description: A Top-Down Cyberpunk Action-Adventure. Lead a Military Special Missions Unit in a battle against deadly lifeforms.

name: Zerone
description: Zerone is a PC-based high-quality VR game, and it is a Hyper FPS game that competes with the enemy units of the mechanic series.

name: SnowFighters
description: Make snowball and Throw to the rivals!! Snowball fight e-sports action game !!

name: Sphere Invasion
description: Sphere Invasion is Sci-Fi Tower Defence. Build your own road and defend it with 7 unique towers.

name: Jake's Paralysis
description: Animated Visual Novel in which you follow Jake through his romantic and student life evolution, making decisions that will impact how the story ends. This game has content unsuitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

name: Miracle Snack Shop: Philia After Story
description: Find out what happens to Philia and our main character as they begin their new lives!

name: Powamo
description: Have Fun fighting with your Powamo in the Fantasy Arena.

name: Jewels of the Mysterious Woodland: Mountains & Clouds Jewel Match
description: Mountains & Clouds Jewel Match - The new match 3 game is here, with brilliant jewels in over 600 dazzling puzzles! A magical journey filled with waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! Swap jewels to clear the way, and match pieces to crush each challenge that lies ahead.

name: Bulldozer
description: Bulldozer is an action game where the player controls a bulldozer and needs to push off all the barrels of the platform except the bulldozer to win the game.

name: 80's Night
description: Endless road, neon lights, palm trees. The game immerses you in the atmosphere of the 80's. Welcome to 80's Night! 80's Night is a car simulator game in which you drive along the endless road and avoid other cars.

name: Lords of Football: United States
description: Now you can play the USA league. Play the USA National League (includes playoff). Taste of the USA – The USA comes with modified building backgrounds; reflecting their real world architectural style.

name: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own - The Final Lesson
description: This pack of six new adventures tells a story of captain de Maure's first months in the Caribbean. New World has new rules and those who want to conquer it must learn it's final lesson.

name: Welcome to Graystone
description: Welcome to Graystone! Once believed to be the human race's next home, you are left alone after an asteroid hits the planet. Survive in an open-world environment, unfit for humans. Few resources remain, and must be rationed to survive. Will you band together, or fight to the survive?

name: Eisenbahn X: Berliner S-Bahn
description: The DB class 481/482 is an elektric railcar designed for conductor rail operation used by the S-Bahn Berlin. It's the latest design for the S-Bahn Berlin and currently the version that is used most.

name: Wirewalk
description: In the not so distant future, with the advancement of virtual reality and the internet of things, a powerful computer virus capable of infecting any digital system is causing chaos throughout the city. Control Rada, a regular programmer who loves baseball, roller skating and going to the bar. Uninvited, she builds a software called The Wirewalker, capable of hacking any infected digital device at the Wired.

name: Master Boy
description: "Master Boy" is a happy-paced cartoon casual role-playing game with Chinese cuisine as the theme. Players can accept tasks in charming urban areas, help friends defend farm and beach, exterminate invaders and collect ingredients to get rewards and improve their own attributes. Just enjoy it.

name: Sweet Bitcoin
description: Have fun playing Sweet Bitcoin and cash out REAL Bitcoin! Not only is this match-three mobile game fun to play, you will get rewarded with Bling Points that can be exchanged for Bitcoin. The amount you receive will be very small, but the more you play, the more you will earn!

name: Age of ILCoin VR: Retribution
description: Age of ILCoin VR: Retribution is a virtual reality game set in a futuristic sci-fi action setting where the ultimate treasure is ILCoins (ILCs). You will become “The Miner” and your mission will be to earn and protect your coins from the space aliens pirates.

name: Hamster Logic 3D
description: Think hard and use your hamster logic to solve the geometric puzzles in this fun and fluffy game!

name: Knell of St. Godhrkar
description: In this game, you can watch as 7 protagonists come to a crossroad, facing their own destiny. You will witness their own choices and the blood-splattering consequence they have on one another. There is no way out except to plunge them into the abyss...

name: Karma: The Dark World
description: This is a first-person story-driven psychological horror game. Delve into this dark and strange world with an investigation officer from Roam to find traces of lost memories and fulfill your destiny.

name: Invasion
description: Invasion is a game about heroes who are fighting an invasion of wild animals that has hit their village.

name: Ravished Realms
description: You've been invited! Follow your classmates in this Visual Novel as they show you around the VR MMORP everyone's been talking about! The only problem? Nina may not be able to handle how attractive her party is!

name: Fire Survival
description: This game is a combination of first person, roguelite random elements and adventure decryption elements of survival games. You play as a normal person who is traped in a randomly generated fire hazard. To survive the hazard, you need to be resourceful. Use items found in the random world.

name: Paralax VR Aim Trainer
description: Paralax VR Aim Trainer is a program designed to help you achieve the best performance in a wide variety of VR games though structured scenarios focusing of the core aspects of aim development (Aiming, Flicking, Tracking and Reaction time) with data to track and support progression

name: Ancient Gods
description: Ancient Gods is a fusion of gacha and deck-building rogue-lite where you collect your character, fight, and experience exciting events. Any character can use all the cards, combine them with the character's passive for ultimate power on your exploration.

name: OnlyGame: Athlete Girls
description: Relax class puzzle game to keep you in a good mood with sexy girls.

name: True or False: Owl Rescue
description: Adventure awaits! All-new campaign featuring 50 facts and introducing a new animal companion - a wise owl.

name: Unhack: Destruction
description: Return to cyberspace for 3 more missions in the Unhack: Destruction DLC, this time centered around Ms Director and her AI duo!

name: Succubus Hotel
description: Due to a poker game, the powerful succubus Carmilla is close to losing her precious hotel. Now, you need to Follow her life trying to Collect Fragments of Desire from humans, at the same time she teaches Corina, a young Neko maid, how to be slut. Can you do that before the 31st day?

name: Super Army of Tentacles 3: The Search for Army of Tentacles 2 - XPack II: Call of Koithulhu
description: Save Halloween in this new quest pack! Complete with two new quests and two new outfit packs (each with a Halloween outfit for every party member)!

name: Genius Greedy Mouse: Greedy of XOR
description: 16 new big levels with pure puzzle mazes, all heavy inspirated from the original XOR classic.

name: Premier Manager 02/03
description: Indulge in pan-European fantasy football by taking control of any club from the four English divisions, or simultaneously from the top two divisions of the continent’s premier leagues (Spain, Italy, France and Germany).

name: HighQ Quiz
description: A simple quiz game with multiple ways to play. Simple and fun

name: FirstQueen1 Next
description: Battlefield with Many Enemies and Allies. Your soldiers will fight or retreat in battle using their own discretion. You watch over the actions of your troops and can either move characters that are in danger to safety or send a strong character to help defeat enemies and lead your army to victory.

name: Anime: World War II - Nazi Zombies
description: Enemies now became even more strong and deadly. Will you be able to keep up with them?

name: DodgeBall VR
description: The Year is 3020 & Earths way of life has changed forever from the way we know it. Individuals are competing for freedom through your favorite childhood game, Dodgeball...

name: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own - Flying the Jolly Roger
